I have already verified these acl mqadmin command in our testing enviroment. @duhenglucky @dongeforever Please help to review this PR.Thanks!
Hi @odbozhou do you verify this pr in your local enviroment?
![acl_command_5_getAclVersionCommand_in_Cluster](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/5010883/59169466-1fa34280-8b6d-11e9-93c6-1b28141cec17.jpg)

@reallax If you want to upgrade 4.1.0 to 4.5.0 with deleger cluster, please  follow this documentation: (https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/blob/master/docs/cn/dledger/deploy_guide.md) do the upgrade
@githublaohu @walking98 Please help to review this pr.If there is no problem.please comments with "LGTM".Thanks.
Firstly,thanks for your suggestion for rocketmq client issue.And then,can you describe your issue in English? @ChaosYjh
Your suggestion is correct.We can disscuss here for this issue. @ShannonDing @duhenglucky

> 
> 
> Hi @odbozhou do you verify this pr in your local enviroment?

Yes，Sending and consuming messages have been validated

1. I suppose it will add doc/README to introduce the usage of the new mqadmin API/cmd.
2. I can not find an API to get the whole ACL content for a given broker, it is important for user/console to get the overview of the ACL at the very beginning.

Thank you for your reply! I will describe my issue first. I think rocketmq should minimize unnecessary client package references to reduce the risk of package conflicts. It is also very helpful for users to select or update RocketMQ. Actually，there are quite a few application systems using Alibaba-rocketmq version under 3.5.8.For this users, they just only referenced fastjson,netty-all,slf4j-api.And it is difficult to let they to update rocketmq client, but acl and message trace is necessary.For those who is using ant, it will be impossible... Other than，even if the version used by the user is 4.x, the three-party package referenced by the client is not controlled. It will be difficult to convince users to update the version. Here is the dependency of rocketmq-client 3.2.6. And here is the dependency of rocketmq-client4.5.1 with all. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/27771595/59248046-d11ca380-8c53-11e9-9ce2-782f923f75dd.png) eg guava:I think is it unnecessary to only used to judge string is not empty. eg commons-codec:It can be replaced with javax.xml.bind.DatatypeConverter#pars​eBase64Binary eg snake​yaml:It was not used in client at all. Thank you. From ChaosYjh ------------------ 原始邮件 ------------------ 发件人: "Hu Zongtang"; 发送时间: 2019年6月10日(星期一) 晚上10:50 收件人: "apache/rocketmq"; 抄送: "苑俊辉"<763900954@qq.com>;"Mention"; 主题: Re: [apache/rocketmq] Suggestion about the third part dependency ofthe RocketMQ client. (#1241) Your suggestion is correct.We can disscuss here for this issue. @ShannonDing @duhenglucky — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub, or mute the thread.

> 1. I suppose it will add doc/README to introduce the usage of the new mqadmin API/cmd.
> 2. I can not find an API to get the whole ACL content for a given broker, it is important for user/console to get the overview of the ACL at the very beginning.

(1)I will add the contents into the doc/acl_guide files.
(2)I will add the query acl yaml config file mqadmin command later.
Thank you very much, @walking98 suggestion for this pr.

+1
I also don't understand why it's a shuffle before calling sort, looks the shuffle is redundant.
LGTM
@zongtanghu and it seems that the PlainPermissionLoader class has been become an ACL manage service, so how about rename this class to AclManage or other names?

> @zongtanghu Please make sure the ci test has been passed in your local environment.

Yes,I passed all the ci tests in my local enviroment.

> @zongtanghu and it seems that the PlainPermissionLoader class has been become an ACL manage service, so how about rename this class to AclManage or other names?

Yes,I thinks so.I will rename this class in this pr.

after dump memory,   i found commit log cost much memory.  there are 20+ map file, each size is 1G. 

when does the map file release memory ?
LGTM
Fixed by this [pr](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/pull/1254)
LGTM
LGTM

> @duhenglucky @ShannonDing
> 
> The error occurred because Travis-CI using an `OpenJDK 11.0.2` building environment, `jdk_switcher` is no longer exists in this building environment. Specify an `Oracle JDK 8` building environment could fix that.
> 
> I only fixed Travis-CI Java 8 building environments in `.travis.yml` at [b567f35](https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/commit/b567f3533475bda3f4bae74c1f4df4844737e3f3), other changes like modify documents or update `README.md` were completed by Alibaba Group staff.
> 
> It's better to merge this pull request to `master` branch. After that, merge branch`master` into `develop` to get the latest changes.

 Thanks for your good job. To keeping the master clear and as same code as the release version, as usual, it 's forbidden to merge PR into master directly. all PRs will be merged into develop branch, then merge into master after tests. Could you please move this PR to the develop branch?
How could I monitor the dead letter queue after consumer failed to consume the message?
Could you please change this PR to develop branch?

> Could you please change this PR to develop branch?

changed
This pr have many commit logs that pushed by other contributors. Could you please rebase it first?  maybe a new pr will be much more better.

Just quickly look through, it needs more tests to make the code reliable in addition to what I have pointed in code review. But if you could do more followup, I would like to help to review again and again... I think it is a good polish for integration with OpenMessaging.

@zongtanghu Another thing, If I could figure out what's you have doing in this pr, I would like to help to merge the pr. But. please remember, consider this change almost over 40 files. It's not a good practice to review and merge model. could you make a  smaller pr, just less than 10 files affected in the next time?

> @zongtanghu Another thing, If I could figure out what's you have doing in this pr, I would like to help to merge the pr. But. please remember, consider this change almost over 40 files. It's not a good practice to review and merge model. could you make a smaller pr, just less than 10 files affected in the next time?

Okay,This PR is too much large.I will remember the rule of puting forward pr for rocketmq source community.

> @zongtanghu Adding data new version mechanism in the acl yaml configuration file for acl mqadmin for acl configuration.
> 
> I paste the description into the google translate, It's unlucky, I could not figure out what's the meaning.
> . I think you could detail your pr purpose, more guys maybe help to review and it's a better way to be let more guys know about what you have done according to your simple text.

Adding data new version mechanism in the acl config file is helping to view different version of every broker's file for users.Because every broker persist its acl config file into local acl config file. @vongosling
@vongosling I have already disscussed the data new version mechanism with @duhenglucky @dongeforever @walking98  in a issue,the link is: https://github.com/apache/rocketmq/issues/1156
Great Job！
Could you please rebase the commit logs pushed by other contributors?

> @aftersss it means that the Server is very busy to resolve the stacked requests, so retrying at this time will increase the pressure on the server, so fast failure is a good choice.

I agree with you.
@amberamberer 死信队列作为最后一个保证，目前没有开放导出或者重放功能，如果有兴趣的话，可以一起提个PR来优化此功能，比如说重放该消息. 另外，如果有什么需要帮助的，麻烦在邮件列表（https://rocketmq.apache.org/about/contact/）里面咨询，很多小伙伴会帮助你的。
Hi @vongosling  I have already resolve the issue that you mentioned above.

> 
> 
> Just quickly look through, it needs more tests to make the code reliable in addition to what I have pointed in code review. But if you could do more followup, I would like to help to review again and again... I think it is a good polish for integration with OpenMessaging.

I will add more unit tests and look forward to contributing more to the community
@zongtanghu Could you help to rebase the pr? I found too many commits for different resolved issue.
Anyway, make the class utils to be testable is a valuable thing. I am very glad to help you to polish your pr and merge to branch finally if you could follow up my comments:-)

@ChaosYjh try to setInstanceName when creating producer，and recommend to create one producer to send different topic messages, and it would be nice if you can proposal a PR to polish this issue.
@ChaosYjh @kangjiabang  We will check this issue in our local enviroment.

> @ChaosYjh try to setInstanceName when creating producer，and recommend to create one producer to send different topic messages, and it would be nice if you can proposal a PR to polish this issue. Set instanceName can resolve this problem,but it will create double tcp connection at least. In our users, there are many application system use producer and consumer both ,and there are three or four consumerGroup,may be more.So I hope they use one clientInstance in common to create tcp connection as little as possible and save resource. In AsyncTraceDispatcher,traceProducer specified producerGroup by TraceConstants.GROUP_NAME always, so I think can we specify a different producerGroup for each traceProducer and use one instanceName in common?

谢谢你的回复。

我debug查看了生产者、消费端负载均衡的情况，发现负载均衡的粒度是queueId + brokerId，而不是queueId，因此，默认的并发消费模式下情况似乎确实是这样。

另外我想请教下：如果要保证一个队列的消息完全顺序，是不是必须要做到这两点：
1. 在发送端指定queueId + brokerId
2. 消费端采用顺序消费

是否有别的方案？

> @fenghaichun
> Setting the queue number of the topic to 1 ensure that messages are consumed in strict order.
> 
> Setting key (e.g. OrderId) to message and using the MessageListenerOrderly ensure that messages are consumption is partially ordered.

I have tried this way: 
1. Set the number of queues for topic to 1 
2. Message consumer uses MessageListenerOrderly 

PS： my deployment: two master brokers

but i found that there is still a problem, the message is not consumed in order, such as the output below：
queue0,/broker1,Hello RocketMQ 1
queue0,/broker1,Hello RocketMQ 3
queue0,/broker1,Hello RocketMQ 5
queue0,/broker1,Hello RocketMQ 7
queue0,/broker1,Hello RocketMQ 9
queue0,/broker2,Hello RocketMQ 0
queue0,/broker2:10933,Hello RocketMQ 2
queue0,/broker2:10933,Hello RocketMQ 4
queue0,/broker2:10933,Hello RocketMQ 6
queue0,/broker2:10933,Hello RocketMQ 8

as mentioned above, for a queue, in the case of two brokers, if no broker is specified in producer, the consumer client seems to see two queues, which are queue 0 stored on broker1 and queue 0 stored on broker2. then consumers will pull messages from these two queues when they consume, if the broker2 network delay or load is too high, the above output will occur.

it seems that only when the producer specifies a queue, a broker, and the consumer uses messagelistenerorderly to ensure that the messages are consumed sequentially.

please tell me what i understand, right?
Hi @duhenglucky @ShannonDing @jonnxu  please help to review this pr,together.

If users start the mutiple producer or consumer instances in the same process,the instance name is the same one.You can set different instance name in the start method when the traceProducer is started. @ahuazhu
